articles.author: Jenni Reid
articles.title: Draghi urges radical European Union reform requiring extra 800 billion euros a year - CNBC
articles.description: The report lays out major challenges that the EU must address through a new industrial strategy, which would include reducing enegy prices.
articles.content:
Italian Prime Minister Mario Draghi during the press conference at the Multifunctional Hall of the Prime Minister on July 12, 2022 in Rome, Italy.
